title: Backstreet Boys
tip: American boy band, big in the late 90s.
fact: Their 1999 album 'Millennium' sold over 30 million copies worldwide.

title: Spice Girls
fact: Their debut single 'Wannabe' topped the charts in 37 countries.

title: Destiny's Child
fact: They won three Grammy Awards during their career.

title: Maroon Five
tip: Pop rock band fronted by Adam Levine.
fact: Their hit 'Moves Like Jagger' features Christina Aguilera.

title: Girls Aloud
tip: British girl group formed on TV.
fact: They hold the record for most consecutive top ten UK singles for a girl group.

title: One Direction
tip: Boy band formed on The X Factor.
fact: They were the first UK group to debut at No. 1 on the US Billboard 200.

title: Little Mix
tip: First group to win The X Factor UK.
fact: They won 'Best British Group' at the 2021 BRIT Awards.

title: Imagine Dragons
tip: US band known for epic rock anthems.
fact: Their hit 'Radioactive' spent over a year on the Billboard Hot 100.

title: Red Hot Chili Peppers
fact: They’ve won six Grammy Awards and were inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame.

title: Arctic Monkeys
tip: British indie rock band from Sheffield.
fact: Their debut album was the fastest-selling in UK chart history at the time.
